## WebWorkerEngine class

PDF engine that runs within webworker

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class WebWorkerEngine implements PdfEngine
```

**Implements:** PdfEngine

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                              | Modifiers | Description                                                                        |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(url, logger)](./engines.webworkerengine._constructor_.md) |           | Create an instance of WebWorkerEngine, it will create a worker with specified url. |

## Properties

| Property                                                | Modifiers | Type                                                                                        | Description                                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [handle](./engines.webworkerengine.handle.md)           |           | (evt: MessageEvent&lt;any&gt;) =&gt; void                                                   | Handle event from web worker. There are 2 kinds of event 1. ReadyResponse: web worker is ready 2. ExecuteResponse: result of execution |
| [prepareTask](./engines.webworkerengine.preparetask.md) |           | [WorkerTask](./engines.workertask.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean, PdfEngineError&gt;                | Task that represent the state of preparation                                                                                           |
| [tasks](./engines.webworkerengine.tasks.md)             |           | Map&lt;string, [WorkerTask](./engines.workertask.md)<!-- -->&lt;any, PdfEngineError&gt;&gt; | All the tasks that is executing                                                                                                        |
| [worker](./engines.webworkerengine.worker.md)           |           | Worker                                                                                      | Web worker instance that execute the pdf engine                                                                                        |
